original: tathā ca na sarvadhūmasya sarveṇa vahninā vyāptiḥ sidhyati/

original: mahānasatvādyavacchinnavahniṃ pratīva tadavacchinnadhūmaṃ pratyapi vyāpakatvena taddharmāvacchinnadhūmaṃ pratyapi vyāpakatvena taddharmāvacchinnasādhanāvyāpakatvābhāvāt/

vyañjanavatvasya yatra parvate dhūma rūpa sādhana vyāpaka tvam tad avṛtti mahānasa tva ādi avacchinna vahni vyāpaka tve pi
tad vṛtti parvata tva ādi avacchinna vahni vyāpaka tve pi tad vṛtti parvata tva ādi avacchinna vahni avyāpaka tvāt
vyañjanavatva anadhikaraṇībhūte dhūma rūpa sādhana adhikaraṇe parvate vartamānaḥ yaḥ parvata tva ādiḥ tad avacchinna vahni avyāpaka tvāt ca
tasmāt vyañjanavat tva ādau na ativyāptiḥ
na avyāptiḥ udbhūta rūpavat tva ādeḥ dravya tva ādi avacchinna spārśana tva rūpa sādhyam prati vyāpaka tve pi ūṣma ādau vyabhicāreṇa
sva iti vyañjanavat tva ādi rūpādhiḥ ucyate
svasya anadhikaraṇūbhūtam yat sādhana adhikaraṇam tad vṛtti iti arthaḥ
sva anadhikaraṇa hṛda vṛtti hada mahānasa anyatara tva avacchinna vyāpakam eva vyañjanavatvam iti tatra ativyāpti nirāsāya

original: etacca lakṣaṇatrayaṃ dhūmena vahnisādhanasthale vyañjanavatvādyupādhau nāstīti nātivyāptirita tāvatkrameṇopapādayati evaṃ ceti//

uṣma ādau vyabhicāreṇa iti

original: etena jñānadvayādapyekasya viśiṣṭajñānasya kāraṇatvaṃ laghviti nirastam/

viśiṣṭa jñānasya eva asiddheḥ
vastu dvaye yugapad upasthite hi lāghava gaurava cintā iti āhuḥ
tat na pratyabhijñā vat anumiti ādi vat ca anubhava siddhasya viśiṣṭa jñānasya tad hetu bhūta jñāna dvayena apalāpe
pratyabhijñāyāḥ tattā smṛtī danta anubhava rūpa jñāna dvayena anumiteḥ vahni smṛti parvata anubhava rūpa jñāna dvayena
vyāpti jñānasya tad hetu bhūta sahacāra ādi jñānena tvad ukta jñāna dvayasya ca tad karaṇena apalāpa prasaṅgāt
bhavati hi tvad mate bhama sthale saṃsarga agraha sahakṛtena grahaṇa smaraṇa rūpa jñāna dvayena
rūpyam iti viśiṣṭa vyavahāravat pratyabhijñā sthale numiti sthale ca a saṃsarga agraha sahakṛtena ukta jñāna dvayena
saḥ ayam iti vyavahāraḥ parvataḥ gnimān ityādi vyāvahārāḥ ca
anyathā bhāntiḥ api svīkāryā
ekasya kāraṇa tva kalpanam laghu iti atas āha etena iti
viśiṣṭa jñānam eva na iti etat nirāha pratyabhijñā vat ityādinā
pratyabhijñāyāḥ ityādi ṣaṣṭhī antānām apalāpa prasaṅgāt iti anvayaḥ
sahacāra ādi ityādi padena vyabhicāra abhāva jñāna grahaḥ

original: viśiṣṭavyāvahārānyathānupapatyā pratyabhijñāderekatvaṃ siddhamityata āha -- saṃbhavati hīti//

original: 1.nāvyā -ga.rā. 2.agṛhītāsaṃsargagrahaṇasma -ga.ṭa.rā. 3.'dvayena' ityādhikaḥ 'soyamitivyavahā' iti paryanto granthaḥ nāsti- ga.rā. 4.tovahnimā  #

dhūmasya pratīta tvāt ca iti ced na

āpādaka tva vyāghātāt

atas eva iti

analyzed: kiñca para mate tarkasya kim viṣaya viśodhana upayogaḥ kim vā vyāpti grahe
ādye api kim udayana rītyā aniṣṭa prasañjana tva mātreṇa upayogaḥ

original: kiṃ vā vardhamānarītyā sādhyābhāvasaṃdehanivartanena yadvā tajjanyasādhyābhāvajijñāsānivartanena,
analyzed: kim vā vardhamāna rītyā sādhya abhāva saṃdeha nivartanena yat vā tad janya sādhya abhāva jijñāsā nivartanena

na ādyaḥ

na dvitīyaḥ
sandehasya tad janya jijñāsayā eva nivṛtteḥ
nirdhūma tva jñānasya niragnika tva sandehena saha viṣaya kṛta virodha abhāvena tad anivartaka tvāt ca
pratyuta nirdhūma tvasya sāgnika tva niragnika tva rūpa koṭi dvaya sādhāraṇyena tat jñānam sandeha upodbalakam eva
mad mate tu viṣaya kṛta virodhaḥ prāk eva uktaḥ
atha para mate tarka upayoga asaṃbhavaḥ
nanu astu bhavat ukta rītyā tarkasya upayoge sati pramāṇa tvam
na tu evam
kim tu anyathā eva upayogaḥ

original: tatra ca tarkasyāprāmāṇyepi na doṣa ityatastaduktopayogaṃ khaṇḍayitumāha -- kiṃñceti//

original: vyāptigrāhakasya viṣayapariśodhakasya veti parāmarśavādānte maṇyukterāha -- kiṃ viṣayeti//

ya pariśodhane u kagarā

original: kiñca vahnivyapte 1 dhūme dṛṣṭe kathaṃ vahnyāvasaṃdehaḥ/
analyzed: kiñca vahni vyapte dhūme dṛṣṭe katham vahnyau asaṃdehaḥ

original: na ca viśeṣadarśane sati svārasikasya vahnyabhāvasaṃdehasyāsaṃbhavepi pratipramāṇāhitā tacchaṅkā yakteti vācyam/

prati pramāṇe na anyathā asiddhe jāgrati tarka sahasreṇa api tad āhita śaṅkā anuvṛti ayogāt
na ca tarkāt eva prati pramāṇasya anyathā asiddhiḥ
tvad mate viṣa kṛta virodha abhāvāt iti ukta tvāt

original: nirdhūmatvasyāyogolakādāviva sāgnikatvepi hṛdādāviva niragnikatvepi sambhavāt sādhāraṇyenetyuktam/

original: bhavanmatepi tarhi nirdhūmatvajñānācchaṅkānivṛttirna syādityata āha-- manmatetviti//

original: nigamane 10 nāpi siddhe satyārambhasya niyamārthatvāt tasmādeva nānyasmāditi hetvanuvādena siddhasādhanatayā -- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: nigamane nā api siddhe sati ārambhasya niyama artha tvāt tasmāt eva na anyasmāt iti hetu anuvādena siddha sādhana tayā

original: - agnimāneva na tvanagnika iti sādhyānuvādena bādhasatpratipakṣayornirāsa iti kathaṃ pañcāvayavaniyame hetvabhāva iti//

ucyate

original: kiṃ tu gṛhītavyāptyādikaṃ puruṣaṃ prati tatsādhakatvenāgṛhītavyāptyādikaṃ prati tu tajjijñāsājanakatvenopayujyate//
analyzed: kim tu gṛhīta vyāpti ādikam puruṣam prati tad sādhaka tvena agṛhīta vyāpti ādikam prati tu tat jijñāsā janaka tvena upayujyate

original: tathā ca vyāptipakṣadharmatābhyāṃ vā vyāptisamucitadeśasiddhibhyāṃ vā viśiṣṭaliṅgasmṛtiryāvatā bhavati tāvadeva vaktavyam/

original: ādye hyanumānamudrābhijñasya vyāptigrahaṇasthale ukte vyāptismṛtirbha vatyeveti na nyūnatā/

original: tatra yo yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāptyuktyaṃśatyāgena mahānasavaditi dṛṣṭāntavacanamātreṇetyarthaḥ/

original: na caivaṃ vādivākyasyāptavākyavadanusaraṇīyatve nigrahodbhāvanaṃ na syāditi vācyam/

original: kiṃ ca tvatpakṣa eva nyūnādinigrahodbhāvanaṃ na syāt/

original: āptavākya iva vādivākye pramāpakatvābhāvepi jñāpakatvamātrasya satvādbādhitārthakavākyasyāpi bodhakatāyā yogyatāvāde sādhanāditi bhāvaḥ//

original: prāguktapakṣeṣu ca dvayorapyabhidhānapratītervirodha ityataḥ sudhoktamanūdya caturdhābhiprāyoktyā virodha nirāha -- yātusudhāyamāmityādinā//

original: evamekadeśakīrtanenāpi sasāmarthyaliṅgasmṛtirbhavati kimu prāguktasaptaprakāraiḥ tatrāpekṣitaśabdānāṃ satvāditi kaimutyābhiprāyā vetyarthaḥ/

original: pratijñādayaḥ pañcāpyavayavāḥ hetvādikiñcitsahitāḥ santaḥ pratyekaṃ paropadeśa ityuktam/

original: kiñca yugapaduktiniyame 'pi tadabhimatasyopanayasya nigamanasya ca pratyekaṃ vyāptyādyuktau śaktatvātkimavayavāntareṇa /

yat api vimatam paramāṇu upādānakam ityādau sādhya aprasiddhiḥ katham iti
tat na kāraṇāt ādi vādi vākyena parasya tad jñāna saṃbhavāt

original: tāvanmātreṇa tatprasiddhyā 1 pattau pramāṇenaiva prasiddhyā bhāvyamiti nirbandhā 2 pātāt/
analyzed: tāvat mātreṇa tad prasiddhyā pattau pramāṇena eva prasiddhyā bhāvyam iti nirbandhā pātāt

original: naiyāyikasyāpi kāraṇādādyupadeśena vā svārthānumānena vā paramāṇvādyavagatisaṃbhavena
analyzed: naiyāyikasya api kāraṇāt ādi upadeśena vā svārtha anumānena vā paramāṇu ādi avagati saṃbhavena
sādhya prasiddheḥ iti ced tarhi sātmaka tva ādi sthale pi evam vaktum śakya tvāt aprasiddha tvam
na doṣāya iti evam upeyam ityādi ūhyam iti bhāvaḥ
ukta tvāt iti
pakṣa lakṣaṇa ukti prastāvaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: vyāptivighaṭanādvādoṣatvamiti pakṣaṃ nirāha-- na tṛtīya iti//
analyzed: vyāpti vighaṭanāt vā adoṣatvam iti pakṣam nirāha na tṛtīyaḥ iti
kim vyāpti svarūpa vighaṭaka tvam abhipretam uta tad graha vighaṭaka tvam ādye
vyāptiḥ ca vyatirekeṇa tatra taiḥ ca avagamyate
iti anuvyākhyāna sudhā uktam hṛdi nidhāya āha ukteṣu ityādi
tarkasya anumāna tāyāḥ sādhita tvāt tarka rūpa anumāneṣu ati uktam
vyatireka mātre iti
mātra śabdaḥ kārsnya paraḥ
sarva kevala vyatirekiṣu bhūḥ itarebhyaḥ bhidyate bhūta tvāt

d d di upapattau ṭa ṭha ḍa ndhaḥ usti ṭa ndha abhāvāt ṭha ḍa
a praddha viśeṣasya daḥ tu aṅgaḥ
anumāna doṣa vādaḥ
mama anvaya vyāpteḥ tava vyatireka vyāpteḥ satvāt ca
śiṣṭam vyatireki bhaṅge uktam

original: nanu vyatirekiṇyaprasiddhena sādhyena sādhanasya kathamanvayavyāptiriti ce 1 nna/
analyzed: nanu vyatirekiṇī aprasiddhena sādhyena sādhanasya katham anvaya vyāptiḥ iti ce na
vyatireka vyāptiḥ api katham
pratiyogi ajñāne vyatireka anirūpaṇāt

original: kiñca manmate sādhyaṃ vinā sādhanasyānupapattireva vyāptiḥ/
analyzed: kiñca mad mate sādhyam vinā sādhanasya anupapattiḥ eva vyāptiḥ
tatra ca vinā śabda ukta sādhya abhāva jñānāya pratiyogi bhūta sādhya dhīḥ eva apekṣitā
na tu pūrvam tad pramitiḥ

original: nanu bhūritarabhinnetyādau trayodaśānyonyābhāvānāṃ viśakalitatayā prasiddhatvenaikabuddhyupārūḍhānāṃ teṣāṃ vyatirekavyāptinirūpaṇaṃ suśakam/
analyzed: nanu bhūritara bhinna ityādau trayodaśa anyonya abhāvānām viśakalita tayā prasiddha tvena eka buddhi upārūḍhānām teṣām vyatireka vyāpti nirūpaṇam suśakam
ghaṭa ādau eva vā sādhya prasiddhiḥ
na ca tathātva invayi tvam tasya pakṣa eka deśa tvāt
na ca evam anumānam vyartham
uddeśya siddhi artha tvāt iti ced tarhi tatra hetu satva asatvābhyām anvayi tva asādhāraṇyoḥ āpāttaḥ ityādi abhiprāyeṇa āha śiṣṭam iti
nanu mama anvaya vyāpteḥ iti ayuktam

original: sādhyāprasiddhau tatsāmānādhikaraṇyasya hetau kvāpyagraheṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyaghaṭitānvayavyāpterasambhavāditi śaṅkate -- nanviti//
analyzed: sādhya aprasiddhau tad sāmānādhikaraṇyasya hetau kvāpi agraheṇa sāmānādhikaraṇya ghaṭita anvayavyāpteḥ asambhavāt iti śaṅkate  nanu iti
āha
nanu para pakṣe nupapati ukti mātreṇa katham sva pakṣe nupapatti parihāraḥ

original: na hi parāṅgaṃ dagdhamiti svāṅgadāhaḥ śāmyadītyataḥ na kevalaṃ pratibandī upapattiścāsmatpakṣe 'stītyāha -- kiñciti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: na hi para aṅgam dagdham iti sva aṅga dāhaḥ na kevalam pratibandī upapattiḥ ca asmad pakṣe sti iti āha kiñcid iti
sattubhyām ṭa ṭha
astu vā sāmānādhikaraṇya niyamaḥ vyāptiḥ

original: tathāpi na tāvadaprasiddhena sādhyena sādhanasyānanvaya eveti yuktam/
analyzed: tathā api na tāvat aprasiddhena sādhyena sādhanasya ananvayaḥ eva iti yuktam
vyatirekiṇaḥ viruddha hetvābhāsa tva āpātāt
sādhya prasiddheḥ vyāpti hetu tvena vyāptim prati ahetu tvāt ca
na api satyā manvayavyāptau
tad grahaḥ na śakyaḥ iti vācyam
pakṣa ādi pravibhāgāt prāk sva śīrara ādau eva pratyakṣeṇa upadeśa ādinā vā avagata sātmaka tvasya
na ca jīvat śarīra mātrasya pakṣīkaraṇāt anvaya dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ

original: abhedasādhakānumāna ivānumityādinā pakṣasyāpi svaśarīrasya niścitasādhyakatayā dṛṣṭāntatvasyāpi sambhavāt// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: abheda sādhaka anumāne iva anumiti ādinā pakṣasya api sva śarīrasya niścita sādhyaka tayā dṛṣṭānta tvasya api sambhavāt
nanu atha api nyāya mata siddha sāmānādhikaraṇya niyama rūpa vyāptiḥ aśakyā eva iti atas tatra api upapattim āha astu vā iti
ananvayaḥ eva iti
asāmānādhikaraṇyam eva iti arthaḥ

original: tathātve nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāditivat viruddhahetvābhāsaḥ syādityarthaḥ/
analyzed: tathātve nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti vat viruddha hetvābhāsaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanvastu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tanniyamarūpavyāptistu sādhyāprasiddhisthale kathamityata āha -- sādhyeti//
analyzed: nanu astu sāmānādhikaraṇyam tad niyama rūpa vyāptiḥ tu sādhya aprasiddhi sthale katham iti atas āha sādhya iti
tathā ca sādhya aprasiddhi sthale tad nirūpita vyāpti jñapteḥ abhāve api niyata sāmānādhikaraṇya rūpa vyāpteḥ apratibandhāt dyāpti vighaṭanāt sādhya aprasiddhiḥ
iti na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ
dvitīyam nirāha na api iti
sudhā uktam āha pakṣa ādi iti
maṇi uktam sarvam atra āha abheda iti
gaṭa teḥ ca
a praddhaḥ viśe sya do tu aṅgaḥ
anumā doṣa vādaḥ
nā api siddha sādhanam
svārtha anumāne tasya adoṣa tvāt
uddeśyāyāḥ śarīra tva avacchedena sādhya pratīteḥ prāk asiddheḥ ca

original: na ca 1 pakṣasya pakṣaikadeśasya vā dṛṣṭāntatve sapakṣatvena 2 vyatirekitvabhaṅgaprasaṅgo vyatirekavādinastaveva tadabhāvavādino mamāpyaniṣṭaḥ//
analyzed: na ca pakṣasya pakṣa eka deśasya vā dṛṣṭānta tve sapakṣa tvena vyatireki tva bhaṅga prasaṅgaḥ vyatireka vādinaḥ tava iva tad abhāva vādinaḥ mama api aniṣṭaḥ

original: nanu svena gṛhītāpi vyāptiḥ śarīramātre vipratipannaṃ prati kathaṃ darśanīyeti cenna/
analyzed: nanu svena gṛhītā api vyāptiḥ śarīra mātre vipratipannam prati katham darśanīyā iti ced na
tam prati vyāpti grahaṇa sthalasya avipratipatyā pratiruddha tvena pradarśayitum aśakya tve
pi jīvat śarīra jātam sa ātmakam prāṇa ādima tvāt yat kāryavat tat kāraṇavat yathā aṅkuravatī
bhūmiḥ bīja garbhā iti sāmānya vyāpti pradarśanasya vā

original: prāṇādimatvaṃ sātmakatvena vyāptaṃ tadabhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyogi tattena vyāptaṃ yathā dhūmo vahnineti vyatirekavyāptyā 4 viśeṣyānvayavyāptisādhanasya
analyzed: prāṇa ādimatvam sātmaka tvena vyāptam tad abhāva vyāpaka abhāva pratiyogi tat tena vyāptam yathā dhūmaḥ vahninā iti vyatireka vyāptyā viśeṣya anvaya vyāpti sādhanasya
anupapatti rūpa anvaya vyāpteḥ viśiṣya pradarśanasya vā saṃbhavāt

original: nanu prāgvyatirekibhaṅge pakṣaikadeśasya dṛṣṭāntatve vyatirekitvabhaṅgo bhavaddhirevāpāditaḥ sa doṣastarhi syādityāśaṅkyā nirāha-- na ceti//
analyzed: nanu prāk vyatireki bhaṅge pakṣa eka deśasya dṛṣṭānta tve vyatireki tva bhaṅgaḥ bhavat hiḥ eva āpāditaḥ sa doṣaḥ tarhi syāt iti āśaṅkyā nirāha na ca iti

original: svārthānumādoṣatvā 5 sambhavepi parārthaprayoge doṣa iti śaṅkate -- nanviti//
analyzed: svārtha anumā doṣa tvā sambhave pi para artha prayoge doṣaḥ iti śaṅkate nanu iti
sudhā ukta diśā samādhim āha tam prati ityādinā
anupapatti rūpā iti
pakṣasya iti na gaṭarā sapakṣa tvena iti na asti garā viśiṣṭasya iti adhikam gaṭarā
viśiṣṭa anva vyatireka vyāpti prasesā tivya atireka vyāptyā anvaya vyāpti pra
yathā ca vyabhicāra sthala anuktau api upādhinā vyabhaicāraḥ

original: yathā vā dṛṣṭāntānuktāvapi dhūmo vahnivyāpya iti āptavākyena vyāptiḥ,
analyzed: yathā vā dṛṣṭānta anuktau api dhūmaḥ vahni vyāpyaḥ iti āpta vākyena vyāptiḥ
tathā anvaya dṛṣṭānta anuktau api anena anumānena anvayavyāptiḥ sidadhyati eva

original: etena sādhyarūpratiyogyajñānāttadabhāva 1 rūpajñānaṃ na yuktamiti sādhyābhāvasya sādhanābhāvena vyāptijñānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti nirastam/
analyzed: etena sādhya rūpa pratiyogi ajñānāt tad abhāva rūpa jñānam na yuktam iti sādhya abhāvasya sādhana abhāvena vyāpti jñānam na saṃbhavati iti nirastam
ukta rītyā pratyakṣeṇa upadeśa ādinā vā sādhya sādhana rūpa asādhāraṇa dharmau ekatra upalabdhavataḥ

original: tato 'nyatra sarvatrāpi tadabhāvaṃ ca paśyato vādinaḥ prativādinopi vādivākyāvagatapratiyoginastadabhāvagrahasaṃbhavena
analyzed: tatas nyatra sarvatra api tad abhāvam ca paśyataḥ vādinaḥ prativādinaḥ api vādi vākya avagata pratiyoginaḥ tad abhāva graha saṃbhavena
vyatireka vyāpti grahasya sulabha tvāt

original: na ca pramāṇenaiva pratiyogī jñātavya iti nayamosti/
analyzed: na ca pramāṇena eva pratiyogī jñātavyaḥ iti
śaśa śraṅga ādi abhāva asiddhyā śaśa śraṅga ādeḥ asatva asiddhi prasaṅgāt
na hi asataḥ niṣedhaḥ sva viriddha sattva apekṣaḥ
praṇādimatvasya sātmaka tva prayojya tayā prāṇādimatvam sātmaka tvena vinā anupapannam iti evaṃrūpeṇa anupapatti rūpa anvayavyāpteḥ viśiṣya pradarśana saṃbhavāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanu pramāṇena pratiyogino 'navagatau kvacitsatvābhāvātkathaṃ tanniṣedha ityata āha-- na hyasata iti/ satve sati
analyzed: nanu pramāṇena pratiyoginaḥ na avagatau kvacid sattva abhāvāt katham tad niṣedhaḥ iti atas āha na hi asataḥ iti satve sati
niṣedhasya eva ayogāt iti bhāvaḥ
rūpa padam na ga ka ṭa rā jñānasya kagarā
a prad dha viśe sya do tu aṅgaḥ
anumā doṣa vādaḥ

original: kiṃ caivaṃ sati tattadvādināṃ parābhimatasaptama 1 padārthapradhānaparamāṇvādiniṣedho na syāt/
analyzed: kim ca evam sati tad tad vādinām para abhimata saptama padārtha pradhāna paramāṇu ādi niṣedhaḥ na syāt

original: na ca tatrāpi pradhānādikaṃ neti na niṣedhaḥ/
analyzed: na ca tatra api pradhāna ādikam na iti na niṣedhaḥ

original: kiṃ tu jagadupādānaṃ paramāṇvā 2 dikaṃ netyevaṃ 3 tathāca khaṇḍaśaḥ pramitarastīti vācyam/
analyzed: kim tu jagat upādānam paramāṇvā ādikam na iti evam tathā ca khaṇḍaśas vācyam

original: pararītyāprasaktasya svarūpeṇaiva niṣedhasaṃbhave svābhimatasya niṣedhapratiyogipramāṇikatvasya nirvāhāyānānubhāvikakḷṣṭakalpane 'nyonyāśrayāt//
analyzed: para rītyā aprasaktasya sva rūpeṇa eva niṣedha saṃbhave sva abhimatasya niṣedha pratiyogi pramāṇika tvasya nirvāhāya anānubhāvika kḷṣṭa kalpane nyonya āśrayāt
saptama iti dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyāḥ ṣaṭ eva bhāva padārthāḥ

original: na saptamostīti saptamapadārthasya sāṅkyābhimatapradhānasya ca niṣedho naiyāyikasya na syāt/
analyzed: na saptamaḥ asti iti saptama padārthasya sāṅkya abhimata pradhānasya ca niṣedhaḥ naiyāyikasya na syāt
tathā sāṅkhya ādeḥ paramāṇu ādi niṣedhaḥ na syāt iti arthaḥ
khaṇḍaśas iti
jagati ca pramitiḥ asti iti arthaḥ
parītya aprasaktasya iti
tadīya vākya ābhāsa prasaktasya iti arthaḥ
anyonya āśrayāt iti
tvad ukta rītyā eva niṣedhe siddhe niṣedhyasya prāmāṇika tva siddhiḥ
siddhe ca tasmin ukta rītyā niṣedha siddhiḥ iti anyonya āśrayāt iti arthaḥ
tvad ukta rītyā niṣedhaḥ na yuktaḥ eva
jagat upādānam iti paramāṇu tvena upādānam sāṃkhya abhimata pradhāna tvena atha ubhaya anugata upādāna tva rūpa sāmānya dharmeṇa upādana mātram iti
vikalpān krameṇa nirāha
ka ṭa ṇu atiriktam kaga ṭarā tatas ca kaga ṭa t padārthasya
upā ṭa ṭha upādāna bhūta ṭha ca ṇu padārtha sya atirikta padārthasya
ca ṭa tyāpi ḍa na tvama ṭha
kiñca jagat upādana śabdena paramāṇoḥ avoktau siddhasādhanam
pradhāna uktau āśraya asiddhiḥ
pramāṇika apramāṇika anugatam sāmānyam tu
etena sātmaka tva rūpa sādhya ghaṭita anvayavyāpti rūpa sādhya apramitā nvayavyāptyā saha vyatireka vyāpteḥ anvayavyāpti agrahāt katham vyatireka vyāptyā anvayavyāpti anumitiḥ
kiñca ityādinā
pramāṇikā iti

original: paramāṇurhi tvanmate prāmāṇikaḥ pradhānamapramāṇikaṃ na hi śaśaviśaṣāṇayorviṣāṇatvasāmānyamiva prāmāṇikāprāmāṇikaparamāṇupradhānarūpobhayagatamupādānatva  #
analyzed: paramāṇuḥ hi tvad mate prāmāṇikaḥ pradhānam apramāṇikam na hi śaśa viśaṣāṇayoḥ viṣāṇa tva sāmānyam iva prāmāṇika aprāmāṇika paramāṇu pradhāna rūpa ubhaya gatam upādāna tva
sāmānyam asti
āśraya abhāve dharma ayogāt
na hi pratiyogi tva asatva ādi vat upādānatvam dharmi sattā nirapekṣam
yena pratiyogi tva ādi pratibandī syāt iti bhāvaḥ
nanu vyatireka vyāptyā anvaya vyāpti anumānam prāguktam ayuktam
sādhyasya aprasiddhau tad nirūpita anu avyapteḥ api aprasiddhyā tayā saha liṅga bhūta vyatireka vyāpteḥ vyāpti graha asaṃbhavāt iti āśaṅkām anūdya nirāha
nanu vyatireka vyāpti rūpa liṅgena anvaya vyāpti rūpa sādhyasya anumāna sthale pi liṅga liṅgi bhūtayoḥ vyatireka vyāpti anvaya vyāptyoḥ anvaya vyāptiḥ tayoḥ vyatireka vyāptyā anumitā
satī sa ātmaka tva prāṇa ādima tva niṣṭha anvayavyāpti anumiti anukūlā astu iti atas āha tatra api iti
tau anva kaṭarā rūpa padam adhikam ṭaḍa
a prad dha viśe sya do tu aṅgaḥ
anumā doṣa vādaḥ
tatra api vyatireka vyāpti āśrayaṇe ca anavasthā iti nirastam

original: yadyadabhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyogi tattena vyāptaṃ yathā dhūmognineti sāmānyavyāpteḥ/
analyzed: yat yat abhāva vyāpaka abhāva pratiyogi tat tena vyāptam yathā dhūmaḥ ugninā iti sāmānya vyāpteḥ
anupapatti rūpāyāḥ viśiṣya anvayavyāpteḥ ca darśita tvāt
evam śabdaḥ aṣṭa dravya atirikta dravya āśritaḥ
aṣṭa dravya āśrita tve bādhaka upapanna tve sati guṇa tvāt
gaganam itarebhyaḥ bhidyate śabdāḥ  /

original: śrayatve bādhakopapannatve sati guṇaḥ sa tadanyāśritaḥ,
analyzed: śraya tve bādhaka upapanna tve sati guṇaḥ sa tad anya āśritaḥ

original: yadya 3 dasādhāraṇadharmavat tatto bhidyata iti sāmānyavyāptirvā/
kaṇādopadeśādinā śabde gagane ca sādhyasādhane upalabdavataḥ“tadanyatra sarvatra
analyzed: kaṇāda upadeśa ādinā śabde gagane ca sādhya sādhane upalabdavataḥ tad anyatra sarvatra

original: tadabhāvaṃ ca paśyata“ityādi pūrvoktarītyā vyatirekavyāptyā 4 viśiṣyānvayavyāptirvā
analyzed: tad abhāvam ca paśyatā etyādi pūrva ukta rītyā vyatireka vyāptyā viśiṣya anvaya vyāptiḥ vā
anupapatti rūpā viśiṣṭa anvaya vyaptiḥ vā upapādyā

original: vyatirekyantareṣvapi sudhoktaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā prāguktarītyānvayavyāptiṃ tredhopapādayati -- evamityādinā//
analyzed: vyatireki antareṣu api sudhā uktam hṛdi kṛtvā prāgukta rītyā anvayavyāptim tredhā upapādayati evam ityādinā

original: yattu maṇyāditārkikagranthe vyatirekyanugrahārthaṃ sāmānyaprasiddhisaṃpādakaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānaṃ niyamiti tatkathanaṃ tadāśaṅkya nirāha--
analyzed: yat tu maṇi ādi tārkika granthe vyatireki anugraha artham sāmānya prasiddhi saṃpādakam sāmānyatodṛṣṭa anumānam niyam iti tad kathanam tat āśaṅkya nirāha
śraya tvāt ityādi śodhitam

original: nacā 1 trāpi śabdaḥ kvacidāśrito guṇatvādityanumānena sādhyaṃ sāmānyataḥ prasiddhamiti vācyam/
analyzed: śabdaḥ kvacid āśritaḥ guṇa tvāt iti anumānena sādhyam sāmānyatas prasiddham iti vācyam
ukta rītyā sādhya apramitau api tredhā vyāpti graha saṃbhavena sāmānyatodṛṣṭa anapekṣaṇāt
kiñca sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya āvaśyaka tve tat eva tarkam vinākṛtam anirdhārita āśraya viśeṣam āśrita tva
sāmānyam gṛṅṇat api itara bādhaka tarka anugṛhītam punar anusandhīyamānam aṣṭa atirikta āśrita tva rūpa viśeṣam eva grahīṣyati
ekasya eva sahakāri vaicitryeṇa vicitra kārya janaka tva darśanāt

original: pūrvayatredhā vyāptyupapādanaṃ vyatirekiṇi kṛtaṃ tatra bhaktipādīyasudhāvākyavirodhamāśaṅkya tadabhiprāyoktyā nirāha -- ṭīkākārīyetyādinā//

original: niyatasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptiriti pakṣe 'pi sāmānyato 'nvayavyāptirvā vyatirekavyāptyanumitā viśiṣṭānvayavyāptirvā uktarītyāstyevetyarthaḥ//

original: uktarītyā svena jñātasya sātmakamityādiśabdārthasya vādināpi prativādinaṃ prati samavāyāntyaviśeṣādiśabdārthasyeva vyutpādane 'viditapadārthakatvābhāvāt/

ukta rītyā iti

original: asti nāstīti vivādarūpakāryeṇaiva tajjñānaṃ vādiprativādinoḥ siddhamiti kathamavidipadārthakatvaṃ pratijñāvākyasyeti bhāvenāha -- tadarthājñāna

original: kāraṇasya viśeṣaṇajñānasyābhāve kāryasya viśiṣṭajñānasyāyogādvā sādhyāsiddherdeṣatvamiti pakṣaṃ nirāha -- na pañcama iti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------

original: yanna bhavati tena samaṃ tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptiriti maṇyuktasāmānyalakṣaṇapakṣe
analyzed: yat na bhavati tena samam tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam vyāptiḥ iti maṇi ukta sāmānya lakṣaṇa pakṣe

original: dhūmo mūle 4 gnimān dhūma 5 vatvāt sammatavaditi kālaṃ deśādikaṃ vā pakṣīkṛtya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ saṃpādyamiti cet // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------

atiprasaṅgaḥ iti

tat katham iti atas āha dṛśyate hi iti
anumitiḥ iti anvayaḥ
anuvyākhyāna ukta udāharaṇam upalakṣaṇam matvā āha padma ityādi

original: kālaṃ deśaṃ vā'dāya sarvatra sāmānādhikaraṇyamāśaṅkate -- nanviti/

deśa ādikam vā iti ādita padena nadīm iti gṛhyate
ptau vaiyadhikaraṇyasya kagarā śanadī garā śasam kagaṭarā gaṭarā matvā ṭa
kim iyam laukika pratītiḥ uta tvad abhimata sāmānādhikaraṇya niyama nirvāhāya evam
prayoga vipariṇāmaḥ kalpyate

original: nādyaḥ/ tvaduktakusṛṣṭimajānatāmapi laukikānāṃ padmādau vikāsādidarśanenaiva sūryodayādau svārthānumiteḥ tadanusāriparārthānumiteśca darśanāt/
analyzed: na ādyaḥ tvad ukta kusṛṣṭim a jānatām api laukikānām padma ādau vikāsa ādi darśanena eva sūrya udaya ādau sva artha anumiteḥ tad anusāri para artha anumiteḥ ca darśanāt
parīkṣakaiḥ ca loka siddha rīti anusāriṇī eva prakriyā kalpyā
na tu sva kalpita prakriyā sā bādhyā
atiprasaṅgāt
uktam ca nyāyaṭīkāyām
siddha anugama mātram tu kartum yuktam parīkṣakaiḥ
na sarva loka siddhasya lakṣaṇena nivartanam

original: dṛśyate hyadtanasya sūryodayasya śvastanena sūryodayena gamyagamakabhāva iti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: dṛśyate hi adtanasya sūrya udayasya śvastanena sūrya udayena gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ iti

original: lokarītyerevaṃrūpatveṣa'pi bhavadbhiriva mayāpi lokarītyanurodhenaiva paribhāṣā kāryeti kuta ityata āha-- parīkṣakaiśceti//

atiprasaṅgāt iti
dhūma ādinā vahni ādi anumiti utpādana ādikam api na syāt
jñānasya api icchā dvārā pravṛtti hetutva kalpanam daṇḍa ādeḥ ghaṭa hetutā vyutpādana ādikam api na syāt iti evamādi atiprasaṅgāt iti arthaḥ
yat vā samāna adhikaraṇānām api gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ na iti api vyutpādana prasaṅgāt iti arthaḥ
kim evam laikikī gaṭarā
vya kaṇāt heḥ do tu aṅgaḥ
anumā doṣa vādaḥ
na dvitīyaḥ anyonya āśraya tvāt
anyathā mad abhimata vaiyadhikaraṇya ādi nirvāhāya parvata adhas deśaḥ gnimān ūrdhva deśasya

original: dhūmavatvāt vimataḥ kālo deśo vā agnimatparvatasaṃbaddhaḥ dhūmavatparvatasaṃbaddhatvāt
analyzed: dhūmavat tvāt vimataḥ kālaḥ deśaḥ vā agnimat parvata saṃbaddhaḥ dhūmavat parvata saṃbaddha tvāt
saṃmata vat ityādiḥ api vipariṇāmaḥ syāt

original: kiṃ caivaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyasya sarvatra susaṃpādatvena vyadhikaraṇāsiddhirniravakāśā syāt/
analyzed: kim ca evam sāmānādhikaraṇyasya sarvatra su saṃpāda tvena vyadhikaraṇa asiddhiḥ niravakāśā syāt
tad asaṃpādane sā sāvakāśā iti ced tarhi asiddhiḥ ukti doṣaḥ syāt
tvad abhimata sāmānādhikaraṇya niyama nirvāhāya iti ukta kalpam nirāha na dvitīya
iti anyonya iti

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyaniyame siddhe sati tannirvāhāya prayogavipariṇāmakalpanā siddhe coktadiśā prayogavipariṇāme sāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamasiddhirityanyonyāśrayādityarthaḥ//
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇya niyame siddhe sati tad nirvāhāya prayoga vipariṇāma kalpanā siddhe ca ukta diśā prayoga vipariṇāme sāmānādhikaraṇya niyama siddhiḥ iti anyonya āśrayāt iti arthaḥ
niravakāśā iti
ayam kālaḥ ātma nitya tvavān kāka kārṣṇyava tvāt ityādi rūpeṇa tvad abhimata vyadhikaraṇa asiddha hetvābhāsa sthale pi

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyasya suvacatvena vyadhikaraṇāsiddherudāharaṇaṃ na kimapi labhyeteti /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyasya suvaca tvena vyadhikaraṇa asiddheḥ udāharaṇam na kim api labhyeta iti
doṣa tvena tasya parigaṇanam ayuktam āpādyeta iti bhāvaḥ
tad asaṃpādane deśa kāla ādinā sāmānādhikaraṇya asaṃpādane iti arthaḥ
me siddheḥ sati tat nirvā mad abhimatā iti mad abhimatam yat vaiyadhikaraṇyam tad ādi nirvāhāya iti arthaḥ
ādi padena sarvatra prayogeṣu deśa kālayoḥ anyatarasya eva pakṣīkaraṇa nirvāhāya iti gṛhyate
iti adhikam ṭha
na artha doṣaḥ
kiñca nā ukti doṣa tvam api

original: rohiṇyudaya āsannaḥ kṛttikāya uditatvāt ityuktāvapi śrotṛṇāmanumityutpatteḥ//
analyzed: rohiṇī udayaḥ āsannaḥ kṛttikāyaḥ udita tvāt iti uktau api śrotṛṇām anumiti utpatteḥ
na dvitīyaḥ

original: vyadhikaraṇeṣva 1 pyanyathānupapanneṣu samānādhikaraṇeṣvapyanyathopapanneṣvaliṅgatvasya ca darśanena pakṣadhmatāyā anāvaśyakatvāt/
analyzed: vyadhikaraṇeṣu a pi anyathā anupapanneṣu samāna adhikaraṇeṣu api anyathā upapanneṣu aliṅga tvasya ca darśanena pakṣadhma tāyāḥ anāvaśyaka tvāt
iha idānīm satā kāryeṇa anyatra anyat asataḥ tad ucita kāraṇasya anumānāt ca
na artha doṣaḥ iti

original: pakṣadharmatāpramitiḥ siddhiḥ tadrahitosiddha iti prācāṃ rītimāśritya lakṣaṇaṭīkoktaṃ niṣkṛṣyāha -- parāmarśeti//

original: yattu maṇau parāmarśaviṣayābhāvo nāsiddhaḥ vyarthaviśaṣaṇatvāt kiṃ tu āśrayāsiddhiḥ svarūpāsiddhiḥ vyāpyatvāsiddhiriti pratyekameva doṣa ityuktam/
analyzed: yat tu maṇau parāmarśa viṣaya abhāvaḥ na asiddhaḥ vyartha viśaṣaṇa tvāt kim tu āśraya asiddhiḥ svarūpa asiddhiḥ vyāpya tva asiddhiḥ iti pratyekam eva doṣaḥ iti uktam
tat tu itara vyabhicāra ādi tvad ukta lakṣaṇe api tulyam iti agre vyaktam
saṅgrāhaka mātra tva isya api tathātvāt iti bhāvaḥ
pramāṇa bādhita viṣayaḥ kāla atyaya apadiṣṭā iti lakṣaṇa ṭīkā ādi ukteḥ āha prabala iti

vakṣyamāṇa antarbhāva su bodhāya maṇi ādi ukta diśā avāntara vibhāgam āha tatra

anumā doṣa vādaḥ

eṃ viruddha ādeḥ api bhedaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: 1 tanna śabdo nityo meyatvāditi sādhāraṇasya sarvamanityaṃ prameyatvādityanupasaṃhāriṇaśca sādhyatadabhāvasāhacaryaṃ koṭidvayopasthāpakaṃ rūpam/
analyzed: tat na śabdaḥ nityaḥ meya tvāt iti sādhāraṇasya sarvam anityam prameya tvāt iti anupasaṃhāriṇaḥ ca sādhya tad abhāva sāhacaryam koṭi dvaya upasthāpakam rūpam

original: iyāṃstu bhedaḥ sādhāraṇasya pakṣādanyatra tatsāhacaryaṃ anupasaṃhāriṇastu pakṣa eveti/

original: anityaḥ śabdaḥ śabdatvāditya 2 sādhāraṇasya tu sādhyavataḥ tadabhāvavataśca vyāvṛttatvaṃ tadupasthāpakamiti savyabhicāralakṣaṇasya 3 nātivyāptiḥ/
analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvāt iti a sādhāraṇasya tu sādhyavataḥ tad abhāvavataḥ ca vyāvṛtta tvam tad upasthāpakam iti savyabhicāra lakṣaṇasya na ativyāptiḥ
āśraya hetu vyāptīnām liṅga parāmarśa viṣaya tvāt tad abhāva vatva rūpam āśraya asiddhi ādi asiddhi traya anugatam

original: yathā sarvamanityaṃ meyatvādityādiprācīnamatāvaṣṭambhena paddhatyādyuktadiśā'ha -- bhedo draṣṭavya iti//

original: tvaduktarītyā pāñcavidhyasambhavepi tena rūpeṇa jñātānāṃ teṣāmanumityapratibandhakatayā

original: bādhitatvātsatpratipakṣatvādityucyate sati vādinā vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvadūṣaṇaṃ vaktumāpādyata ityāha -- bādhitatvā 4 pratiruddhatvādityasya hīti//

original: yadvākye prativādyuktadūṣaṇāvagatiḥ sa nigṛhīta iti samayabandhena kathāpravṛttau

original: durbalapramāṇavirodhasya akiñcitkaratvenāsādhakatvāsādhakatayā tadvyāvṛttaye prabaletyādyarthavadityata āha -- dūrbalasyeti//
analyzed: durbala pramāṇa virodhasya akiñcitkara tvena asādhakatva asādhakatayā tad vyāvṛttaye prabala ityādi arthavat iti atas āha dūrbalasya iti

original: durbalaṃ hi hīnabalatvādevāpramāṇatvena nirṇītamiti pramāṇapadaprayoga eva tatra na yukta iti tena tadvyāvṛttirityarthaḥ/

original: nanu kathaṃ tarhi satpratipakṣasthale vastuto hīnabale samabalatayābhimanyāne pramāṇapadaprayoga ityata āha-- pramāṇeti//
analyzed: nanu katham tarhi sat pratipakṣa sthale vastutas hīna bale sama bala tayā abhimanyāne pramāṇa pada prayogaḥ iti atas āha pramāṇa iti
na tu iti
hīna bale tu tad niścayaḥ evā asti iti bhāvaḥ
ubhaya anugatam hīna bala vyāvartakam dharma antaram āha ahīna iti
tat avāntara iti
prabala samabala iti avāntarabheda iti arthaḥ

original: tathā caikamevedaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāditi pañceti vibhāgabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ//

tat iti
prabala samabala iti viśeṣaṇa upādānam bādha pratirodhayoḥ iti arthaḥ
dūṣaka tā bījasya iti
pramāṇa virodha rūpa tvasya vā ahīna bala pramāṇa virodha tva rūpasya vā ekatvena iti arthaḥ
śeṣya ṭa rā
vyāvartya abhāve vidyamāna tva mātreṇa upādāne prabala cākṣuṣa pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt iti adya api prayujyeta
na ca parasya ati aśakti jñāpana artha tvāt na vaiyarthyam iti vācyam

kiñca bādhitena api tvām aham jetum śaktaḥ iti

original: nanu sambhavamātreṇa tathā prayoge ko doṣa ityata āha-- vyāvartyeti//
analyzed: nanu sambhava mātreṇa tathā prayoge kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha vyāvartya iti
bādhaḥ hi prabala pratyavirodha prabala anumāna virodha prabala āgama virodha ādi bhedena anekavidhaḥ lakṣaṇa ṭīkāyām vyaktaḥ
tathā ca prabala pramāṇa viruddha tva ādi vat pratyakṣa virodhe ipi avāntarabheda upapādanena prabala cākṣuṣa prabala spārśana virodha ādi bhedena api udbhāvyeta
na ca evam aṅgīkṛtam
tathātve pañcatva vibhāga bhaṅga prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ
ati aśakti iti
prabala virodham api tvam na
jñātavān kimu pramāṇa virodha mātram iti aśakti jñāpana artha tvāt iti arthaḥ
aśakti jñāpakasya eva iti

original: aśaktijñāpanamātreṇa parāpajayasya svajayasya ca saṃbhavena tanmātrasyaivoddeśyenātiśayi 2 tāśaktijñāpanasyānuddeśyatayā tādarthyena sārthakyoktirayuktā/

original: nanu prabalamapi na jānāmi kimu samabalamityastu kaścitatiśaya iti manvānaṃ pratyāha -- kiṃ ceti//

dhā jñāḥ rā

original: bhāvenedaṃ prayuktamityapi suvacatvātparasya śaktyatiśaya eva kiṃ na sidhyet/

original: kiñca bādhepi pramāṇapadenaiva prabala 1 tvepi labdhe prabalapadaṃ 2 vyartham/
analyzed: kiñca pramāṇa padena eva prabala tve ipi labdhe prabala padam vyartham

yadi api pratirodhasya para pakṣa pratibandha mātram phalam

tathā api sva pakṣa sthāpanāyāḥ pṛthak kartavya tvāt
bādhasya parapakṣa prati
parasya iti bādhita anumāna prayoktṛ rvādinaḥ iti arthaḥ
evam api iti
bedhe prabala iti pramāṇa viṣeṣasya ati aśakti jñāpana arthatayā sārthakye pi iti artha
tat avastham eva iti
saṃbhāvita te kṛtyasya sarvasya prāṅga nirāsāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: prabalapadaṃ vyarthamityeva na kintu viruddhārthakatvācca nopadeyamasādhakatvānumāna 4 mityāha -- kiñca bādhepīti//
analyzed: prabala padam vyartham iti eva na kintu viruddha arthaka tvāt ca na upadeyam asādhaka tva anumānam iti āha kiñca bādhe pi iti
idam asādhakam pramāṇa viruddha tvāt iti ukte prabala pramāṇa viruddha tvasya sva abhimatasya
lābha ddoṣa tvena sama bala pramāṇa virodha sādhāraṇye saṃbhavati

original: nanu samabalavyāvṛtyarthakasya na hānikaratvena viparītaphalatvaṃ bādhasya svapakṣasthāpanāparapakṣapratikṣepalakṣaṇādviruddhirūpatvāt
analyzed: nanu sama bala vyāvṛti arthakasya na hāni kara tvena viparīta phala tvam bādhasya sva pakṣa sthāpana apara pakṣa pratikṣepa lakṣaṇāt viruddhi rūpa tvāt

atas eva na anarthakam api iti codyam anūdya avadyati yadi api ityādinā
ati aśakti jñāpana artha tayā sārthakye tiprasaṅgam ca āha kiñca eva parasya iti

vṛtti tvam eva upādhiḥ iti iti vakṣyamāṇa tvena upādhi asaṅkarasya api abhāvāt

original: yā tu vyāptijñānahetubhūtasahacārajñānasya sahakāri yo 'bhāvaḥ tatpratiyogibhūtaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadviṣayatvenaikīkaraṇānnādhikyamiti kaścidāha
analyzed: yā tu vyāpti jñāna hetu bhūta sahacāra jñānasya sahakāri yaḥ bhāvaḥ tad pratiyogi bhūtam yat jñānam tad viṣaya tvena ekīkaraṇāt na ādhikyam iti kaścid āha

iti ca nirastam iti arthaḥ

original: prāguktatrividhavipakṣavṛttitvānāṃ jñānasyābhāvaḥ tatpratiyogibhūtaṃ jñānaṃ prāguktānāmeva jñānaṃ tadviṣayatvenetyarthaḥ/

original: svarūpasataivoktaviṣayatvenaikīkaraṇe tu na taddhetvābhāsavibhāge tantramityuktatvena hetvābhāvasādhikyatādavasthyam//

kiñca vyāpti jñāna hetu bhūta sahacāra jñānasya vyabhicāra jñāna abhāvaḥ iva sahacāra abhāva jñāna abhāvaḥ
vyāpti abhāva jñāna abhāvaḥ ca sahakārī iti tad pratiyogi bhūta jñāna viṣaya tvam viruddha upādheḥ asahacārasya
vyāpya tva asiddhi upādheḥ avyāpteḥ ca asti iti tayoḥ api sādhāraṇa upādhi tvam syāt

original: na ca sahakāryabhāvaśabdena vyabhicārajñānābhāvarūpa eva sahacāribhūtābhāvo vivakṣita iti nopā- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: na ca sahakāri abhāva śabdena vyabhicāra jñāna abhāva rūpaḥ eva sahacāri bhūta abhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti na upā
na tu pratibandhaka jñāna viṣaya tvena iti etat anūdya nirāha svarūpa satā iti
ukta tvena iti
yad rūpeṇa hi jñānam anumiti pratibandhakam ityādinā granthena vyavahita bhaṅge uktatvena iti arthaḥ
ādhikya iti

tat ativyāptam ca iti āha kiñca vyāpti jñāna iti

original: sahacārajñānasahakārībhūtā 3 bhāve saṅkocavivakṣayātivyāptyabhāvaśaṅkāṃ nirāha -- na ca sahakārīti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------

original: kiñca samavāyavṛtyā yatra vahnyabhāvaḥ taddṛttitvaṃ dhūmepyastīti vyāptigrahānupraviṣṭasaṃbandhena yatra sādhyaṃ nāsti sa vipakṣa iti vaktavyatayāvaśyakatvenāvyāptireva

ātma āśrayāt iti

original: sādhāraṇavyabhicāra 1 tvaṃ nānetyukte sādhāraṇavyabhicāra 2 tvaṃ nāma vyāptigrahahetusahacārajñānasahakārībhūto
analyzed: sādhāraṇa vyabhicāra tvam nānā iti ukte sādhāraṇa vyabhicāra tvam nāma vyāpti graha hetu sahacāra jñāna sahakārībhūtaḥ
yaḥ vyabhicāra jñāna abhāvaḥ tad pratiyogi jñāna viṣaya tvam vyabhicāra tvam sarveṣu anugakam ekam iti ukte
vyabhicāra nirukteḥ vyabhicāra ghaṭita tvāt ātma āśrayaḥ iti arthaḥ

vyabhicāra nirukti śarīra praviṣṭa vyabhicarāṇāḥ vipakṣa tvam sādhya atyanbhāvavatvam ityādinā prāgukta diśā nānātvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: vyāptiśarīrapraviṣṭasambandhābhāvasyājñāne vipakṣatvāderajñānena tajjñāne 'vaśyaṃbhāvini tadabhāvarūpāvyāptireva doṣostu kiṃ tādṛśasambandhena
analyzed: vyāpti śarīra praviṣṭa sambandha abhāvasya ajñāne vipakṣa tva ādeḥ ajñānena tad jñāne vaśyaṃbhāvini tad abhāva rūpa avyāptiḥ eva doṣoḥ tu kim tādṛśa sambandhena

original: asādhāraṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ tu sarvasapakṣavyāvṛttatvaṃ tadevodbhāvyamasādhakatāsādhakaṃ ca/

tat na

original: 3 sapakṣavyāvṛttatvasya dūṣakatve nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt ityādiviruddhasyāpi tathātvādvipakṣavyāvṛttatvamuktam/

a dūṣaka tā bījena iti

ubhayavya vṛtta tvam iti

original: sapakṣavipakṣavyāvṛttatvasya dūṣakatva ityādirītyāsti- ṭha. 3.sapakṣetyādi nāsti -ṭa. 4.kṣādvayā - ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------

lakṣaṇam udbhāvyam asādhaka tā sādhakam ca
viruddhaḥ api viruddha tva ajñāne sarva sapakṣa vyāvṛtta tva jñāna daśāyām asādhāraṇaḥ eva
na ca asya avyāpti avāntarbhāvaḥ
pakṣāt anyatra sādhya abhāvasya satve api tatra hetoḥ abhāvāt

tarka avatāra daśāyām tu asādhāraṇyāt uttīrṇa tvena hetvābhāsa tvyā eva abhāvāt
asādhāraṇaḥ hi anitya doṣaḥ
idam eva hi abhipretya sudhāyām asādhāraṇasya dūṣaṇa tva asammateḥ iti uktam

original: anyasya dūṣakatābījatve tadanyasya nāsādhakatāsādhakatvamityetadarthāntaranyāsena vyanakti -- na hīti//

idam eva iti

uktam iti arthaḥ

original: “satyapi sapakṣe tatrāvartamānasya kiṃ vyāptireva nastyuta kevalavyatirekivadastīti sandehāvaskandanā“diti paddhatyuktaṃ 1 hṛdi kṛtvā'ha --  #
analyzed: sati api sapakṣe tatra āvartamānasya kim vyāptiḥ eva na asti uta kevala vyatireki vat asti iti sandeha avaskandanāt iti paddhati uktam hṛdi kṛtvā āha  /
yat vā asādhāraṇaḥ iti
ktim ṭaḍa

original: yadvāsādhāraṇaḥ sarvasādhyavadvyāvṛtyā sādhyābhāvavyāpto vā sarvasādhyābhāvavadvyāvṛtyā sādhyavyāptoveti sandehenāvyāptāvantar 1 bhāvaḥ//
analyzed: yat vā asādhāraṇaḥ sarva sādhyavat vyāvṛtyā sādhya abhāva vyāptaḥ vā sarva sādhya abhāvavat vyāvṛtyā sādhya vyāptaḥ vā iti sandehena avyāptau antar bhāvaḥ
atha vā asādhāraṇasya pakṣa mātra vṛtti tvena na anvayavyāpti dhīḥ
nā api vyatireka vyāpti dhīḥ

original: yatra 2 nityatvābhāvaḥ tatra śabdatvābhāva iti vyatirekavyāpteryatrānityatvābhāvaḥ tatra śabdatvābhāva iti pratikūlayā vyatirekavyāptyā pratiruddhatvāt/
analyzed: yatra nitya tva abhāvaḥ tatra śabda tva abhāvaḥ iti vyatireka vyāpteḥ yatra anitya tva abhāvaḥ tatra śabda tva abhāvaḥ iti pratikūlayā vyatireka vyāptyā pratiruddha tvāt

original: ata eva pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ pakṣa eva vartamānatvena vyāpteragrahaṇādityuktam//
analyzed: atas eva pramāṇa lakṣaṇa ṭīkāyām pakṣe eva vartamāna tvena vyāpteḥ agrahaṇāt iti uktam
yat vā asādhāraṇaḥ pakṣe sādhya sandehāt sandigdhā

original: vyatirekavyāptisaṃbhavo 'yaṃ na hetvābhāsa iti paddhatyuktaṃ kasya cinmatamapākurvāṇaḥ lakṣaṇaṭīkārītyāntarbhāvamāha -- athaveti//
analyzed: vyatireka vyāpti saṃbhavaḥ yam na hetvābhāsaḥ iti paddhati uktam kasya cit matam apākurvāṇaḥ lakṣaṇa ṭīkā rītyā antarbhāvam āha athavā iti
nanu na vyatireka vyāpti dhīḥ iti ayuktam

original: vyāptisambhavena taddhīsaṃbhavādityato vyāpteḥ sambhave 'pi pratirodhānna taddhīrityāha -- yatreti//
analyzed: vyāpti sambhavena tad dhī saṃbhavāt iti atas vyāpteḥ sambhave pi pratirodhāt na tad dhīḥ iti āha yatra iti
vyāpteḥ agrahaṇāt iti asya

original: pakṣa eva vyāpteraniścayāt kiṃ tu sandehādityapyarthamupetyāha -- yadveti//
analyzed: pakṣe eva vyāpteḥ aniścayāt kim tu sandehāt iti api artham upetya āha yat vā iti
niścita sādhya abhāvavati hetu sandehaḥ iva
bhūtaḥ kagarā trāṇi gaṭarā avyāpti padam

original: vyāptaḥ/ dṛṣṭaṃ ca pakṣa eva vyabhicārasandehasya doṣatvam sa śyāmo mitrātanayatvādityādau/
analyzed: vyāptaḥ dṛṣṭam ca pakṣaḥ eva vyabhicāra sandehasya doṣa tvam sa śyāmaḥ mitrā tanaya tvāt ityādau
tanayā antare śyama tva aniścayāt
nanu tatra saṃśayaḥ upādhyāhitaḥ
saḥ eva ca saṃśayaḥ anumiti pratibandhakaḥ
phala balena eva tathā kalpanāt
na tu anyaḥ
tasya anumāna aṅga tvāt
sat anumāne tu saṃśayaḥ na upādhyāhitaḥ iti
anyathā anumāna mātra ucchedāḥ
iha api saṃśayaḥ sarva sapakṣa vipakṣa vyāvṛtti āhitaḥ
saḥ eva ca saṃśayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ
phala balāt

original: kiṃ ca savyabhicāraviruddhānadhyavasiteṣu na tāvadavyāptirnāstīti yuktam/
analyzed: kim ca savyabhicāra viruddha anadhyavasiteṣu na tāvat avyāptiḥ na asti iti yuktam
teṣu pakṣa dharma tāyāḥ satvena hetoḥ ābhāsa tva ayogāt

original: nāpyavyāpteḥ satve 'pi tadajñā 2 ne 'pi anyajñānādevānumānaṃ duṣṭamiti vācyam/
analyzed: na api avyāpteḥ sattve api anya jñānāt eva anumānam duṣṭam iti vācyam
anyasya anumāna avirodhi tve doṣa tva ayāgāt
virodhi tvam api na tāvat sākṣāt phala vighaṭa nena
bādha pratirodha antarbhāva āpatteḥ
na api karaṇa vighaṭa nena
tathātve

original: nanvastvito 'nya 5 traiva kaścana prakāra ityata āha -- na ca hetvābhāsa 6 tva iti//
analyzed: nanu astu itas kaścana prakāraḥ iti atas āha na ca hetvābhāsa tve iti
vyāpti pakṣa dharmatā tad vighaṭanaka rūpa prakāra catuṣṭaya anyaḥ pañcamaḥ prakāraḥ iti arthaḥ
vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā yuktatvam eva prakāraḥ iti atas āha vyāpti iti
prakāra antareṇa savyabhicāra ādi hetvābhāsa niyamam para abhimatam nirāha kiñca iti
phala iti
anumiti rūpa phala iti arthaḥ bādhā iti
pakṣa dharma tva abhāva vyāpya tayā iti na kāle
saḥ iti ḍa
vighaṭanasya āvaśyaka tvena avyāpti asiddhi anyatara antarbhāvasya durvāra tvāt

original: etadevābhipretyoktaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇe -- asiddhiravyāpti 1 śca hetuvirodha iti//
analyzed: etat eva abhipretya uktam pramāṇa lakṣaṇe asiddhiḥ avyāptiḥ ca hetu virodhaḥ iti

original: oṃ iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadbrahmaṇyatīrtathapūjyapādānāṃ śiṣyeṇa śrīmavdyāsayatinā viracite śrīmattarkatāṇḍave anumānaprapañcanaṃ
analyzed: om iti śrīmat paramahaṃsa parivrājaka ācārya śrīmat brahmaṇyatīrtatha pūjya pādānām śiṣyeṇa śrīmat dyāsayatinā viracite śrīmat tarkatāṇḍave anumāna prapañcanam
śrī kṛṣṇa arpaṇaḥ tu
tayoḥ grāhya abhāva avagāhi tvena sākṣāt eva anumiti pratibandhaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
etat eva iti
ukta niṣkṛṣṭam prameyam eva abhipretya iti arthaḥ
yad prasādāt imām vyākhyām akārṣam naumi tam harim
anasūyā garbha ratnam ānvīkṣikyāḥ prakāśakam
yat avocam aham tena prīṇātu puruṣottamaḥ
prāyeṇa alasa buddhi tvāt lokānām tad jighṛkṣayā
na udgrantham kṣamyatām budhaiḥ
iti śrīmat paramahaṃsa parivrājaka ācārya sudhīndratīrtha guru pāda śiṣya rāghavendrayati kṛte
tarkatāṇḍavavivṛttau nyāyadīpe tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ
saṃvyākhyam tarkatāṇḍavam samāptam
śrī kṛṣṇa arpaṇam astu
hega ṭarā kya artham āṭa ṭhaḍa
